name: Retro Sphere
summary:
Feeling of speed, love for a dizzying drive and devotion to retro is about you? Then, welcome to RETRO SPHERE! 
RETRO SPHERE is a game in the genre Runner, made in an attractive style of neon colors and contrasting colors for dynamic and mesmerizing music. All this in the game with serious complexity and thousands of obstacles that will in every way get up on your way to the goal set by the game. 
 
You have to overcome many really difficult levels in the role of a small sphere for the sake of the goal - to find a hotbed of contagion in the neon city and destroy it! 
 
Each level has a unique atmosphere and dynamics, so you will not get bored in the game!
